results.title: Protective role of antidiabetic drug metformin against gentamicin induced apoptosis in auditory cell line.
results.text_hl: In the present study, the preventive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Gentamicins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005839 @@@gentamicin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Hearing_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006311 @@@ototoxicity@@@ were investigated through the changes of intracellular @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ concentrations using @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ imaging in @CELLLINE_CVCL:D899 @@@HEI-OC1@@@ cells.
